description:
This plugins has one Action (server side) : it removes all the diacritics (accents and special chars) from a string to replace it with its "normal" character.
à --> a
è, é, ê, ë --> e
ç --> c
and so on ...

Demo here : https://tncc-demos.bubbleapps.io/version-test/nodiacritics
name: TNCC - No Diacritics
plugin_instructions:
It exists in two flavors, for performance purpose :

⏺️ Element : No Diacritics.
1. Drop the element on your page
2. in your workflow, use the element's Action "Remove Diacritics"
3. get the cleaned text in the Element's event : "Diacritics removed" with the "Cleaned Text" state containing the text without diacritics.

⏺️ Server-side :
Just use the Action : "remove diacritics" with your text as a parameter. 
The text without the diacritics is returned a s result of the action.
